description: Commands to manage the Eureka Server for Spring for the Container Apps environment.

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring create
commands.summary: Command to create the Eureka Server for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring create --environment
                                                                   --name
                                                                   --resource-group
                                                                   [--bind]
                                                                   [--max-replicas]
                                                                   [--min-replicas]
                                                                   [--no-wait]
                                                                   [--set-configs]
                                                                   [--unbind]
examples:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring create -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring create -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --set-configurations PropertyName1=Value1 PropertyName2=Value2

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring delete
commands.summary: Command to delete the Eureka Server for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring delete --environment
                                                                   --name
                                                                   --resource-group
                                                                   [--no-wait]
                                                                   [--yes]
examples:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring delete -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring show
commands.summary: Command to show the Eureka Server for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring show --environment
                                                                 --name
                                                                 --resource-group
examples:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring show -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

commands.name: az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring update
commands.summary: Command to update the Eureka Server for Spring.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring update --environment
                                                                   --name
                                                                   --resource-group
                                                                   [--bind]
                                                                   [--max-replicas]
                                                                   [--min-replicas]
                                                                   [--no-wait]
                                                                   [--remove-all-configs {false, true}]
                                                                   [--remove-configs]
                                                                   [--replace-configs]
                                                                   [--set-configs]
                                                                   [--unbind]
examples:
az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --set-configurations PropertyName1=Value1 PropertyName2=Value2

az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --replace-configurations PropertyName1=Value1 PropertyName2=Value2

az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --remove-configurations PropertyName1 PropertyName2

az containerapp env java-component eureka-server-for-spring update -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyJavaComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --remove-all-configurations
